 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַד‎</span>] **verb** ==wail, lament== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפַד‎</span>, ChrPalAramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 64</sup>; Assyrian [***sapâdu]***], ***sipdu, sipittu, mourning***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 507</sup>; compare Amharic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dirge*** [[BDB#Prä|Prä]]<sup>ZMG xxxv (1881), 762</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָֽפְדָה‎</span> consecutive [[Zech.12.12|Zech 12:12]], 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָֽפְדוּ‎</span> consecutive [[1Kgs.14.13|1Kgs 14:13]]; [[Zech.12.10|Zech 12:10]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּסְפֹּד‎</span> [[2Sam.11.26|2Sam 11:26]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְפֹּד‎</span> [[Ezek.24.16|Ezek 24:16]], 1 singular cohortative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶסְפְּדָה‎</span> [[Mic.1.8|Mic 1:8]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְפְּדוּ‎</span> [[Jer.6.16|Jer 6:16]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפְדוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.3.31|2Sam 3:31]] + 2 t.; feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפֹ֫דְנָה‎</span> [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפוֺד‎</span> [[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפוֺד‎</span> [[Eccl.3.4|Eccl 3:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְפֹּד‎</span> [[Gen.23.2|Gen 23:2]]; [[1Kgs.13.29|1Kgs 13:29]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְפּוֺד‎</span> [[Jer.16.5|Jer 16:5]] ***Participle active*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹפְדִים‎</span> [[Isa.32.12|Isa 32:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוֺ‎</span> [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]] — ***wail, lament*** (with loud cries, etc., see [[Mic.1.8|Mic 1:8]], and compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Amos.5.16|Amos 5:16]]</sup>), especially for dead, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, [[1Sam.25.1|1Sam 25:1]]; [[1Sam.28.3|1Sam 28:3]]; [[1Kgs.14.13|1Kgs 14:13]]; [[1Kgs.14.18|1Kgs 14:18]]; [[Gen.23.2|Gen 23:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Jer.16.6|Jer 16:6]]; [[Jer.22.18|Jer 22:18]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.34.5|Jer 34:5]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאַלתֵּֿלֵךְ לִסְפּוֺד וְאַלתָּֿנֹד לָהֶם‎</span> [[Jer.16.5|Jer 16:5]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> ***over*** [[2Sam.1.12|2Sam 1:12]]; [[2Sam.11.26|2Sam 11:26]]; [[1Kgs.13.30|1Kgs 13:30]], compare [[Zech.12.10|Zech 12:10]] (see v[[Zech.12.12|Zech 12:12]] below); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> i.e. marching ***before*** (bier) [[2Sam.3.31|2Sam 3:31]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); with accusative of congnate meaning with verb [[Gen.50.10|Gen 50:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); absolute [[1Kgs.13.29|1Kgs 13:29]]; [[Ezek.24.16|Ezek 24:16]] compare v[[Ezek.24.23|Ezek 24:23]]; [[Eccl.3.4|Eccl 3:4]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רקד‎</span>; compare [[Ps.30.12|Ps 30:12]]), and participle as substantive [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]] ***wailers***; also, with idea of guilt on part of those wailing, [[Zech.12.12|Zech 12:12]] (compare v[[Zech.12.10|Zech 12:10]] above); over calamity, judgment, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> [[Mic.1.8|Mic 1:8]], absolute [[Jer.4.8|Jer 4:8]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵילִיל‎</span>), [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]] and (with fasting) [[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]]; [[Joel.1.13|Joel 1:13]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלשָֿׁדַיִם סֹפְדִים עַלשְֿׂדֵיחֶֿמֶד וגו‎</span> [[Isa.32.12|Isa 32:12]] is dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] and others ***upon the breasts smiting*** (?) ***for the fields***, etc., but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂדִים‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺֿת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִַ֯ם‎</span>) [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>Comm.</sup> (q. v.) [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13 Skinner</sup> and others: ***over the fields wailing, over the delightful fields***, etc. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִסָּֽפְדוּ‎</span> [[Jer.16.4|Jer 16:4]] ***they shall not be bewailed***, so [[Jer.25.33|Jer 25:33]]. 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂפֹדְנָה‎</span> [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]] Masora, &lt; modern editions <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספד‎</span>.
